created_by: Florian Roth, Markus Neis, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community
name: Chafer Activity
description: Detects Chafer activity attributed to OilRig as reported in Nyotron report in March 2018
query: ((process.command_line:/.*\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*[Ii]/ OR /.*[Uu]/)) OR (process.command_line:/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Bb][Aa][Rr]\\[Aa][Uu][Tt][Oo][Ii][Tt]3\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.command_line:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ss][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\[Dd][Bb]\\.*/ AND process.executable:/.*\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.command_line:/.*\\[Nn][Ss][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk][Uu][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\-[Qq]\=[Tt][Xx][Tt].*/ AND process.parent.executable:/.*\\[Aa][Uu][Tt][Oo][Ii][Tt].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.command_line:*\\Service.exe* AND process.command_line:(*i OR *u)) OR (process.command_line:*\\microsoft\\Taskbar\\autoit3.exe OR process.command_line:C\:\\wsc.exe*) OR (process.executable:*\\Windows\\Temp\\DB\\* AND process.executable:*.exe) OR (process.command_line:*\\nslookup.exe* AND process.command_line:*\-q\=TXT* AND process.parent.executable:*\\Autoit*))`
